question: Is size 14 fat or curvy?
question_content: I'm 13, 5"7 and I am a size 14. I'm not unfit and I eat healthily with lots of fruit and veg ( I have to because I'm a vegetarian ). Me and my family take walks around Draycote Water on Sundays (which is a 5 mile walk!) and I go on the Nintendo Wii Just Dance most days. I'm quite good at PE and do pretty well seeing as I have bad Asthma. So please tell me, am I fat or curvy?

answers.answer_content:
I use to be size 14 i am 5'9 i was never considered "fat" always curvy. I am not size 10 and people say i look to skinny, and my ribs do show at size 10 which for other people this is a normal healthy weight.

My point in what i said, is that i am big boned and by the sounds of it you're big boned and no matter how much fruit and veggie you eat you wont be size 8. YOU SOUND HEALTHY so keep it up

(Sorry if i didnt make sense or rambled on)

I'd say curvy i'm a size 14 as well & i see myself as fat..but people call me voluptuous and plus i'm tall i'm 5'9 so i think we are just a bigger build because of our height but that doesn't mean we're fat ..but thats what society calls us..it's just that f*cked up! ya know?
Curvy (lol another kyle :-) but in a good way
